name: Weiguo Wang (王伟国)
description:
I am currently a Staff Engineer in the Technology Planning Department at NIO (蔚来), working on multimodal sensing for automotive applications.
I obtained my Ph.D. degree from Tsinghua University, advised by [Prof. Yuan He](http://tns.thss.tsinghua.edu.cn/sun/members/YuanHe). My research interests lie at the intersection of mobile computing, wireless sensing, and communication, with a particular specialization in the field of acoustics. I am enjoying building proof-of-concepts for innovative applications, covering both hardware and software aspects.

E-Mail: wangwg.wwg@gmail.com (permanent)   weiguo.wang2@nio.com  

Research Internship Available: I am continually seeking research-focused interns in multimodal LLM and sensing for automotive applications. Interested candidates please feel free to reach out at any time!
